title: Storing Washed Whole Carrots

items.name: Water submersion method
items.details: Place washed whole carrots in a container or resealable bag with enough water to fully submerge or at least keep them moist. Store in the fridge.

items.name: Change water regularly
items.details: Change the water every few days to keep the carrots fresh.

items.name: Shelf life
items.details: This method keeps carrots crisp for up to 2 weeks.

notes: Since the carrots are already washed, the water submersion method is the best approach. The water maintains crispness and prevents the carrots from drying out. Regular water changes prevent bacterial growth.
